reference.title: ERXCTLR_EL1, Selected Error Record Control Register, EL1
reference.shortdesc: Register ERXCTLR_EL1 accesses the ERR<n>CTLR control register for the error record selected by ERRSELR_EL1.SEL.

section.p: If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==0, then ERXCTLR_EL1 accesses the ERR0CTLR register of the core error record. See ERR0CTLR, Error Record Control RegisterThe ERR0CTLR contains enable bits for the node that writes to this record:.
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==1, then ERXCLTR_EL1 accesses the ERR1CTLR register of the DSU error record. See the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
